name: Frontly
title: frontly.ai
payoff: Build custom apps with no code
shortDescription: Frontly enables users to create custom applications using AI without any coding knowledge. It's designed for entrepreneurs, small businesses, and non-technical users who need to quickly deploy functional apps. An example use case is a small business owner creating a custom CRM system to manage customer interactions and data without hiring a developer.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Bubble
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Visual app building with more integrations
